name: Crustacean Camera Caddie
description:
Forget about saving the city, you're just here to get the shots that bring in the ratings during the morning news. How? You're a pro-golfer turned kaiju photographic journalist. Use golf balls that are 360-degree cameras to shoot pictures of the blobby crabby kaiju destroying the city. Take all she shots your boss wants, or you'll get fired!

  • Experimental gameplay mash-up of the beloved Pokémon Snap and Wii Sports Golf
  • Made using Free Open-Source Sofware (Godot and Blender)
  • A prototype made for Kaiju Jam 2
How To Play:
  • Left Arrow / Right Arrow - Rotate Character
  • Mouse - Pan Camera
  • Hold Space - Power Golf Shot
  • R - Reset Ball
  • Left Mouse Click - Take a Picture!
